Trade/Device Name(s): Oral Fluid DAT Qual Cal B
Oral Fluid DAT SQ Cal B
Oral Fluid DAT Control Set B
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Kinetic interaction of microparticles in solution (KIMS)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Roche DAT Oral Fluid Amphetamine Assay and related calibrators/controls using KIMS technology for qualitative and semi-quantitative detection of amphetamine in oral fluid.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic for qualitative and semi-quantitative detection of amphetamine in human oral fluid collected exclusively with the Intercept Oral Specimen Collection Device; results aid labs in assessing assay performance and estimating dilutions for confirmation by LC/MS/MS.
